title: Жена с того света
overview: Inna works as a substitute senior accountant. She is accused of stealing a huge amount. Only an accident saves the woman from prison - by mistake everyone thinks Inna was killed in an accident. "Death" shows Inna the true state of affairs: "beloved" husband Nicholas betrays her. Bitterly aware that she was betrayed by those whom she so trusted, that she can not be near her children: Denis and Lisa. After all, if Inna "resurrects", then she immediately goes to jail. Girlfriend - Katya gives her an idea: to use her "dead" status, to take revenge on the traitors and at the same time try to regain her good name.
